ERROR_MESSAGES.ALPHANUMERIC_ONLY: Please type English and number only

LISTING_INFO_LOCATION.HOW_TO_GO_DESCRIPTION:
This is a Thai voice instruction of how to go to the house.
Play this to a taxi driver.

LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.SECURITY_CHECK_DESCRIPTION:
The reception at the lobby might ask you to fill the form, which can be filled with anything, and give your passport to make a copy for a security procedure. 

 Please follow their request without resistance as it is merely a formality which will not cause any trouble at all.
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.EARLY_CHECK_IN_N_OUT_DESCRIPTION: Early check-in and Late check-out is only possible when there is no other staying guests
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.LEAVE_LUGGAGE_FIRST_DESCRIPTION: Luggage can be left first at 12:30
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.KEEP_LUGGAGE_ON_CHECK_OUT_DESCRIPTION: Luggage can be kept in one of our vacant houses, if any, after check out.
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.LEAVE_KEY_CARD_DESCRIPTION: Please return the key card and tidy up the house as you check out.
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.LEAVE_KEY_CARD_ON_THE_TABLE: Leave your key card on the dinning table.
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.LEAVE_KEY_CARD_IN_THE_MAIL_BOX: leave your key card in the mail box
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.LEAVE_KEY_CARD_IN_THE_MAIL_BOX_IMG_DESCR:
Please send us the photo of returned key card.

If the returned key card is lost without the photo, we will have to claim compensation for loss from you.
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.LEAVE_KEY_CARD_IN_THE_MAIL_BOX_IMG_EXAMP: This is an example of the photo. Send the photo via Airbnb app or any of your favorite messenger.
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.CLEAN_CHECK_OUT_DESCRIPTION: Please tidy up the house as much as you can for the next guests. We would appreciate your cooperation!
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.REVIEW_US: Your 5 star review means A LOT to us. If you are satisfied with our service, please leave us a good review :)

CONTACTS.ADD_CONTACTS_DESCRIPTION: Please add phone number or ID below in your preferred messenger

SERVICES.TRANSPORTATION_AIRPORT_SHUTTLE_DESCRIPTI: Airport shuttle service provides a ride between the airport and the house. The service charge can be paid through Airbnb.
SERVICES.TRANSPORTATION_AIRPORT_SHUTTLE_PICKUP_SP: Your driver will be waiting at the pick up spots below holding your name card.
If you are delayed over an hour from arrival time, you will be charged an overtime fee.
